content.rendered:
When a young boy disappears, a small town encounters a mystery featuring secret experiments, scary supernatural powers, and a strange little girl.”

Seasons: 4 (2016- )

Status: Ongoing

Creators: Matt Duffer, Ross Duffer

Channel: Netflix

Starring: Millie Bobby Brown, Finn Wolfhard, Winona Ryder
